title: Italian, Australian Officials Defend Helping Barr in Review of Russia Probe’s Origins
text:
Italy’s prime minister and high-ranking officials in Australia, facing criticism from opposition parties, this week defended their participation in Attorney General William Barr’s expanding review of the origins of the Russia investigation.

The Italian intelligence services made clear they have no connection to a professor whose encounter with a Trump campaign aide in 2016 helped spur the Federal Bureau of Investigation’s counterintelligence probe into Russian election interference, Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte said...
description: Italy’s prime minister and high-ranking officials in Australia, facing criticism from opposition parties, this week defended their participation in Attorney General William Barr’s review of the origins of the Russia investigation.
